title: Performance appraisal: the human dynamics
brief_description: This film looks at the performance appraisal in everyday situations, including work. Dr. Alex Rosen, a specialist in organisational performance appraisal talks about the subject and sites that a number of organizations have experimented with a variety of performance appraisal systems, in an attempt to make a valuation of work performance a more productive experience.
